title: Industry Advisory Panel
description: The department has recently established an industrial advisory panel with experienced professionals from selected industries to provide feedback and suggestions to improve students' knowledge in the field.

title: Computer Science Symposium
description: An annual symposium hosted by the Computer Science Department to discuss the latest advancements in the field of Computer Science.

title: Tech Talks with Industry Experts
description: A series of talks with leading tech industry experts sharing their insights on the latest trends in technology.
